ai-atk-abh03a13:2_1: Now, as to the clause, “That is the discussion” .
ai-atk-abh03a13:2_2: Herein, there is in the past, future or present, internal or external, grosserver of the constituents (of mind and body) of the past, future, and present in the future.
ai-atk-abh03a13:2_3: Furthermore, ‘In the past’, those who speak contradict the Teaching are included in the past. They speak evasively.
ai-atk-abh03a13:2_4: (They are) present in the future. In the present converse with the spending of the bases of the sense fields ...” , etc., should be understood in the way beginning, “In the middle way, and in the end,” and “the meaning is that.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_1: Or alternatively, if they’re not able to ask questions, then they should ask a question:
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_2: Herein, there is no meaning that have, there is no meaning.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_3: But there is no place, no making known, setting up, and using what is impermanent, suffering, and perishable, they speak of what is impermanent, not easy to speak.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_4: Second: having asked permission of others, of their own speech, speaking well of others, because of speaking (his).
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_5: But it does not appear to them as their individual essence, but which is accompanied by absence of anything, etc., because there is no not-self.
ai-atk-abh03a13:5_0: In the past, future, and present.
